price: Nokorε sε, medeε mesuro Da kεseε no asotwee no ho asεm ma mo”.
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innī akhāfu ʿalaykum ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
